pullrequest.title: fix build on homebrew with ffmpeg4

content.raw: I get the same result as you on OSX with the changes in this branch. I tested on ubuntu xenial but I don't hear anything before and after the changes. I haven't tried running `worlds/openal.world` in a long time and never on this laptop before so it could be a problem on my end.
content.html: I get the same result as you on OSX with the changes in this branch. I tested on ubuntu xenial but I don't hear anything before and after the changes. I haven't tried running worlds/openal.world in a long time and never on this laptop before so it could be a problem on my end.
